content: I am currently 18 years old I perceive the world as it appears to me, rather than as it is Writing is one of the few ways for me to share this perception with someone Whatever fascinates me, I research it and I want to know how it works I don’t know the name of the town where I went on holiday, but I still remember what I read there I have read many times more books than I have finished I haven’t finished most of the books I’ve read. Sometimes I’m a big mess What is this website powered by? HUGO static site generator PaperMod theme
title: About
